doc.previous: Internet access in Sierra Leone has been sparse but is on the increase especially since the introduction of 3G cellular phone services across the country There are three main internet service providers ISPs operating in the country Freetown has internet cafes and other businesses offering internet access Problems experienced with access to the Internet include an intermittent electricity supply and a slow connection speed in the country outside Freetown
doc.after: The arts in Sierra Leone are a mixture of tradition and hybrid African and western styles 179 180 181
